item.title: azure: [Launched] Generally Available: Azure MySQL Extended Support
item.description:
Microsoft announced the general availability of Extended Support for Azure Database for MySQL â€“ Flexible Server, beginning in spring 2026, to help customers manage upgrade timelines for MySQL versions that have reached end of life.
